job.title: New Grad, Software Engineer, Full stack
job.description: Were Cruise a selfdriving service designed for the cities we lovebrbrWere building the worlds most advanced selfdriving vehicles to safely connect people to the places things and experiences they care about We believe selfdriving vehicles will help save lives reshape cities give back time in transit and restore freedom of movement for manybrbrCruisers have the opportunity to grow and develop while learning from leaders at the forefront of their fields With a culture of internal mobility theres an opportunity to thrive in a variety of disciplines This is a place for dreamers and doers to succeedbrbrIf you are looking to play a part in making a positive impact in the world by advancing the revolutionary work of selfdriving cars join usbrbrThe Consumer group is responsible for bringing autonomous vehicles to market We define and build applications tools and services that empower customers to connect with the places things and experiences they care about We build apps websites and APIs to power ride hail and delivery on our fleetsbrbrIf you are looking to play a part in making a positive impact in the world by advancing the revolutionary work of selfdriving cars join usbrbrstronguWhat Youll Be DoingbrustrongulliDesign and implement fullstack solutions to manage our growing set of product offerings powered by our autonomous vehiclesliliBuild internal tools to manage our unique development deployment and testing workflowsliliDevelop robust APIs for client applications and vehicle communicationsliliOwn deployed code to our live production fleet of autonomous vehiclesbrliulstronguWhat You Must HavebrustrongulliExperience building modern frontends using React Webpack Babel or similar toolsliliExperience building scalable backend APIs using Nodejs Go or similar languagesliliExperience with relational databaseslili2 years of productionlevel experience building full stack applicationsliliBS MS or PhD in CS Math Physics or equivalent realworld experienceliliPassion for selfdriving technology and its potential impact on the worldliliAttention to detail and drive for building an amazing productbrliulstronguBonus Points For Being Familiar WithbrustrongulliExperience working with Docker development and deployment workflowsliliExperience with Typescript Reactjs React Native GraphQLliliExperience with telephonyteleconferencinginstant messaging at production scale brliulstrongWhy Cruisestrong ulliOur benefits are here to support the whole youliulliCompetitive salary and benefits lili401k Cruise matching program liliMedical  dental  vision ADD and LifeliliOne Medical membershipliliFlexible vacation and company paid holidaysliliHealthy meals and snacks provided for nonremote employeesliliPaid parental leaveliliFertility Benefits liliDependent Care Flexible Spending Account subsidized by CruiseliliFlexible Spending Account liliMonthly wellness stipendliliPretax Commuter Benefit Plan for nonremote employeesliulul ulliWere IntegratedliulliThrough our partnerships with General Motors and Honda we are the only selfdriving company with fully integrated manufacturing at scaleliulul ulliWere FundedliulliGM Honda Microsoft SoftBank amp T Rowe Price have invested billions in Cruise Their backing for our technology demonstrates their confidence in our progress team and vision and makes us one of the leading autonomous vehicle organizations in the industry Our deep resources greatly accelerate our operating speedliulul ulliWere IndependentliulliWe have our own governance board of directors equity and investors Our independence allows us to not just work on the edge of technology but also define itliulul ulliWere VestedliulliYou wont just own your work here youll have the potential to own equity in Cruise too We are competing in a market that is projected to grow exponentially which gives our company valuation room to growbrliululemCruise LLC is an equal opportunity employer We strive to create a supportive and inclusive workplace where contributions are valued and celebrated and our employees thrive by being themselves and are inspired to do the best work of their lives brbrememWe seek applicants of all backgrounds and identities across race color ethnicity national origin or ancestry citizenship religion sex sexual orientation gender identity or expression veteran status marital status pregnancy or parental status or disability Applicants will not be discriminated against based on these or other protected categories or social identities Cruise will consider for employment qualified applicants with arrest and conviction records in accordance with applicable lawsbrbrememCruise is committed to the full inclusion of all applicants If reasonable accommodation is needed to participate in the job application or interview process please let our recruiting team know or email HRgetcruisecombrbrememWe proactively work to design hiring processes that promote equity and inclusion while mitigating bias To help us track the effectiveness and inclusivity of our recruiting efforts please consider answering the following demographic questions Answering these questions is entirely voluntary Your answers to these questions will not be shared with the hiring decision makers and will not impact the hiring decision in any way Instead Cruise will use this information not only to comply with any government reporting obligations but also to track our progress toward meeting our diversity equity inclusion and belonging objectivesbrbrememstrongNote to Recruitment Agenciesstrong Cruise does not accept unsolicited agency resumes Furthermore Cruise does not pay placement fees for candidates submitted by any agency other
